C

changeScore - Variable in class p4_group_8_repo.Player
Trigger that alrts for a need to update the score
changeScore() - Method in class p4_group_8_repo.Player
This is a public method that can be called to check whether theres been a change in the score
checkcontrol() - Method in class p4_group_8_repo.PlayerController
This method runs with the game timer and its in charge for checking keyboard input and arranging appropriate actions once input is detected ands it changes animal sprites accordingly since it is a constantly running function it also calls the checkintersections function
checknextfree(String) - Method in class Worlds.World
method that implements slot system that checks the next slot on the Y axis that the obstacle can be added to
createnextlvlscrn() - Method in class p4_group_8_repo.ViewManager
This method creates and sets a scene between levels, it is similar to the win screen but has the ability to proceed to the next level
createtable() - Method in class p4_group_8_repo.ViewManager
This method creates a scene with a table that shows the highest 10 scores of previous players
createTimer() - Method in class Worlds.World
This function starts a game timer and calls the act functionality of each actor
createwin() - Method in class p4_group_8_repo.ViewManager
This method creates and sets a win screen for the player that apears when the player completes 10 levels
